name: AussieBushProject
description:
A low poly, simulation/state machine project with an australian bush theme.

Use the buttons at the bottom to check the needs of the selected animal and direct them to fill those needs. If they get too low they will die!

Move the camera with mouse or WASD

Zoom with scroll wheel or + and -

Rotate with Q and E

Set the gamespeed with 1, 2 and 3.

Move camera to selected creature with F
